name: IMG_ANNOT_AUDTRAIL
description: This displays items for the audit trail of changes to the annotations done to an image.

columns.name: DOCUMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the document record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The Line Count for the IMG per Document - The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: IMAGE_ANNOTATION_X
columns.description: Contains X coordinate of the annotation

columns.name: IMAGE_ANNOTATION_Y
columns.description: Contains the Y coordinate of the annotation

columns.name: IMAGE_ANN_TEXT
columns.description: This items contains the text of the annotation

columns.name: IMAGE_ANN_COMPON_ID
columns.description: This item contains the link to measurement component data that is saved to the image as an annotation.
